channel.title: To DO LIST (WILL REP++)
channel.description:
PLEASE NOTE! i dont want people to spoon feed but just get me on the right track. also i have attempted all these and im stumped :( any help would be awesome!
1. Disable Spawning Of Noted Items / Sell of noted items
2. working Mute & Ip Mute Command.
3. pnpc command
4. [s]what is the code format to make the command to check if u have an amount of cash and then remove it from inventory. ex (&&P.Item >= 100)[/s]
5. Do u know where to find a 508 "Vote For Cash" tut i have looked and searched. also which site should i use for mysql for noobs? also any other helpful info would be great!
6. Good commands to add to a 508 + server? -Fun -Important -shortcut commands -etc
7. How To make it so p.rights above 2 can drop. somewhere its set to if p.rights >= 2 i need to change it to p.rights == 2. where do i change this?
8. where do i modify which player rights can trade? example im owner but p rights is 2 (admin) so i cant trade. i want to add to the trade code so if username = my name i can trade.
9. any one know any dupes that i should fix in codeusa?
10. Magic does not work on npc (Dont know where to even start)
11. how to make an npc hit harder
12. range and mage protect does not work mele does. (dont know where to fix)
13. do u know any vote for cash tuts for 508? thats descriptive for noobs?
14. when a group op people fight a npc boss only the one player who is being attacked gets the drop. how do i make it random instead?
15. specs dont work on npcs
16. if you have any other things that i should modify for a 508 + please feel free to shout it out
THANKS SO MUCH!
Brandon

item.title: To DO LIST (WILL REP++)
item.dc:creator: @ta1nt3d ta1nt3d
item.description:
@ta1nt3d wrote:

[quote=“b15, post:3, topic:378699”]sweet! thanks so much! what if i were to add it to a button in action buttons.

for example case 259: if (buttonId == 2) {//veng runes Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 560, 12); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 9075, 14); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 557, 11); } if (buttonId == 3) {//barrage runes Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 560, 14); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 565, 12); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 555, 16); } THANKS SO MUCH!

…ALSO BUMP[/quote]

if you mean ClickingButtonds class than yes you would fine the actionbutton # and the add it in like this in ClickingButtons(idk what it is for you)

case 28170://Barrage Rune Set if (c.inWild() && !c.isInBank()) { c.sendMessage("You cannot do this right now"); } else if(c.getItems().freeSlots() <= 3) { c.sendMessage("You need atleast 3 free slot's to use this feature."); } else if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(995, 200000)) { c.getItems().deleteItem2(995, 200000); c.getItems().addItem(560, 400); c.getItems().addItem(555, 600); c.getItems().addItem(565, 200); } else { c.sendMessage("You need atleast 200,000 coins to use this feature."); } break;
wasent gona ask for rep but i kinda need one

Read full topic

for number 4

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("YOUR COMMAND")) { if (c.inWild() && !c.isInBank()) { c.sendMessage("You cannot do this right now"); } else if(c.getItems().freeSlots() <= 3) { c.sendMessage("You need atleast 3 free slot's to use this feature."); } else if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(995, 200000)) { c.getItems().deleteItem2(995, 200000); c.getItems().addItem(560, 400); c.getItems().addItem(555, 600); c.getItems().addItem(565, 200); } else { c.sendMessage("You need atleast 200,000 coins to use this feature."); } break;
